The **tessel** project is coordinated by Nicolas Frerebeau and Brice Lebrun.

The project is supported by the [Center for Research in Physics Applied to Archaeology](http://www.iramat-crp2a.cnrs.fr/) (Bordeaux, France) and the [Research Center for Prehistoric Art](http://mshs.univ-toulouse.fr/) (Toulouse, France).
